LanguageData.ZeroTech_FalsePast-Bionic_SuitEffect.lab: Zero sub Technology: Bionic suit effect
LanguageData.ZeroTech_FalsePast-Bionic_SuitEffect.hel: The part of Zero Technology can be installed in the whole body bionic, when installed more than one at the same time is able to produce a resonant effect, then you will get a smaller bonus, and every five pieces installed, the bonus attributes will be enhanced. For example, white/red blood/bone imitations.
